---
title: "JWTAlgorithm"
---

# `JWTAlgorithm`

Represents the algorithm supported by Oslo for signing JWTs.

## Definition

```ts
type JWTAlgorithm =
	| "HS256"
	| "HS384"
	| "HS512"
	| "RS256"
	| "RS384"
	| "RS512"
	| "ES256"
	| "ES384"
	| "ES512"
	| "PS256"
	| "PS384"
	| "PS512";
```
